amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the funding for the Joint Improvised Explosive Device Defeat Fund by $120.5 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funding for the Joint Improvised Explosive Device Defeat Fund by $120.5 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A026) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A026) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Ms. Speier.
